text: This game released today and after seeing such positive reviews, I'm even more excited to play it. The moment I watched its reveal at Ubisoft's E3 conference, I knew it would be refreshingly great. You can really feel the love and passion oozing out of the team behind it. The music by Grant Kirkhope is top notch and really charming; the live orchestration helps give it a fantasy/magical feel wich this theme really pulls off. Even with such a good launch year for the Switch, this seems to be one of its best games. Kudos, Ubisoft!
